content:
Udemy frequently offers discounts and sales on their courses, and I'd be happy to help you find some great deals on photography courses. Here's a step-by-step guide to find discounted photography courses on Udemy:

**Method 1: Udemy's Deals Page**

1. Go to Udemy's [Deals page](https://www.udemy.com/deals/).
2. Click on the "Photography" category or use the search bar to find photography courses.
3. Filter the results by "Discount" or "Price: Low to High" to see the courses with the deepest discounts.
4. Browse through the list, and you'll find courses with discounts ranging from 10% to 90% off.

**Method 2: Udemy's Course Page**

1. Go to Udemy's [Course page](https://www.udemy.com/courses/search/?q=photography).
2. Type "photography" in the search bar and press Enter.
3. Click on the "Discount" filter on the left sidebar to see courses with discounts.
4. You can also use the "Price" filter to set a maximum price you're willing to pay.
5. Browse through the list, and you'll find courses with discounts and their original prices crossed out.

**Method 3: Udemy's Email Newsletter**

1. Sign up for Udemy's email newsletter on their website.
2. Keep an eye on your inbox for promotional emails with discounted course offers.
3. Udemy often sends out emails with limited-time discounts, flash sales, or special promotions.

**Method 4: Third-Party Coupon Websites**

1. Websites like RetailMeNot, Coupons.com, or CouponFollow aggregate Udemy coupons and promo codes.
2. Search for "Udemy photography coupons" or "Udemy discount codes" to find relevant offers.
3. Copy the coupon code and apply it during checkout on Udemy's website.

**Some popular photography courses on Udemy with current discounts:**

1. **"Photography Masterclass: Your Complete Guide to Photography"** - 92% off, now $10.99 (originally $129)
2. **"The Ultimate Photography Course: From Beginners to Experts"** - 85% off, now $14.99 (originally $99)
3. **"Photography Fundamentals: Learn the Basics of Photography"** - 75% off, now $19.99 (originally $79)
4. **"Night Sky Photography: Capture Stunning Milky Way Photos"** - 70% off, now $24.99 (originally $84)
5. **"Drone Photography: Aerial Photography and Videography"** - 60% off, now $29.99 (originally $74)

Please note that prices and discounts may vary depending on your location and Udemy's pricing policies. Always check the course description, reviews, and instructor ratings before making a purchase, even if it's discounted.

Happy course hunting!
